constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: This application seeks to extend the scope of the previous permission by seeking to make amendments to the existing porch. The existing porch was not included within the scope of the planning permission and as such its inclusion now would be greater than non-material. Please note this decision is not an indication of whether such a proposal would be acceptable it is only a determination on whether the proposal is non-material.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/03478/HOU (Conversion of existing garage to a habitable room. Erection of front bay window extension and part single, part two-storey side/rear extensions. Raising roof ridge height with rear dormer roof extension and installation of 1no front and 4no side rooflights to facilitate loft conversion). Amendment to include alterations to front porch with installation of 1no. front rooflight, changes to fenestrations to rear and side
